articles.author: Jack Dunn
articles.title: Stephen Colbert Rips ABC Pulling Jimmy Kimmel as ‘Blatant Censorship’ to Appease Trump: ‘With an Autocrat, You Cannot Give an Inch’ - Variety
articles.description: Stephen Colbert ripped Disney for pulling "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" off the air as "blatant censorship": "With an autocrat, you cannot give an inch."
articles.content: Stephen Colbert came to the defense of fellow late-night host Jimmy Kimmel on Thursday’s “The Late Show” on CBS, using his monologue to blast ABC executives for indefinitely suspending “Jimmy Kimmel … [+3236 chars]
